attributes.action: MPs to be ranked by constituents for effectiveness and value for money
attributes.additional_details:
All the MPs (after two years service) who get low scores will then be placed on Special Measures and be made subject to recall if their performance failed to improve within one year. This would ensure than all MPs are made more accountable to their constituents and those who fail to represent their constituency appropriate can be removed and replaced with someone who will represent their constituent's views.

The Prime Minister, Deputy Prime Minister and Members of the Cabinet should face additional scrutiny and be rated for efficacy/proficiency by all UK Constituents.

Failure to improve and connect appropriately with the people of UK will be met with removal from Parliament or additional special measures to be put in place.

MPs Expenses accounts much be more accessible and accountable to the public to ensure that no inappropriate expenses no matter how small are claimed.
